programme.title: Robin and the Hoods
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Drama ║ 2024 ║ PG
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Darcey Ewart and Naomie Harris. Robin is an 11-year-old girl who plays imaginative games with her friends, the Hoods, on the wooded land near to their homes. They engage in pretend battles against rival gangs, but a greater challenge emerges when a property developer, "Clipboard Phil Hawkins - Director Darcey Ewart - Robin Mark Williams - Mayor Naomie Harris - Clipboard Gwendoline Christie - Aura / Witch Gloria Ishikawa - Amaya Dexter Sol Ansell - Little Dan Bruno Edgington-Gibson - Glen Eddison Burch - Henry Tom Goodman-Hill - Nick Christine Bottomley - Bridget Morgana Robinson - Cathy.

programme.title: Under the Boardwalk
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Musical, Drama, Animation, Music, Action, Family, Romance, Arts And Culture ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Armen is a land crab who lives under a boardwalk at the Jersey Shore. When he falls for Ramona, a sea crab tourist, tensions between their friends and families rise. However, a storm casts the duo far from home, leading to an epic adventure which unites the divided community. programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: Biblical comedy starring LaKeith Stanfield. programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
programme.desc: Action spy thriller starring Tom Cruise and Hayley Atwell. The crew of the Enterprise are on the verge of splitting up, following the wedding of Riker and Troi, when they are sent to investigate a suspect Romulan treaty. On arrival, they discover that the new leader of Romulus is the spitting image of Captain Picard Stuart Baird - Director Patrick Stewart - Jean-Luc Picard Jonathan Frakes - Cmdr William T Riker Brent Spiner - Lt Cmdr Data / B-4 LeVar Burton - Lt Cmdr Geordi La Forge Michael Dorn - Lt Cmdr Worf Marina Sirtis - Counselor Deanna Troi Gates McFadden - Dr Beverly Crusher Tom Hardy - Shinzon Ron Perlman - Viceroy Shannon Cochran - Senator Tal'aura Dina Meyer - Commander Donatra Kate Mulgrew - Admiral Janeway Wil Wheaton - Wesley Crusher Majel Barrett - Computer Whoopi Goldberg - Guinan Bryan Singer - Starfleet officer.

programme.title: Star Trek Into Darkness
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Benedict Cumberbatch. Captain Kirk's disdain for protocol sees him stripped of the command of the Enterprise, but he is given a chance to prove himself after volunteering to find and stop a mysterious operative who's out to destroy Starfleet J J Abrams - Director Chris Pine - Captain James T Kirk Zachary Quinto - Spock Benedict Cumberbatch - John Harrison Karl Urban - Dr Leonard McCoy Zoë Saldana - Nyota Uhura Simon Pegg - Montgomery \Scotty\ Scott Anton Yelchin - Pavel Chekov John Cho - Sulu Alice Eve - Carol Peter Weller - Admiral Marcus Bruce Greenwood - Christopher Pike Noel Clarke - Thomas Harewood Heather Langenkamp - Moto Leonard Nimoy - Spock Prime Nazneen Contractor - Rima Harewood Aisha Hinds - Navigation Officer Darwin Deep Roy - Keenser.

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Idris Elba. Three years into its five-year mission, the USS Enterprise stops off at a remote outpost for maintenance and provisions. There the crew answer a distress call from a stranded ship, but they are attacked by an army of unknown aliens that overwhelms the Enterprise. n Justin Lin - Director Chris Pine - Captain James T Kirk Zachary Quinto - Commander Spock Karl Urban - Dr \Bones\ McCoy Zoë Saldana - Lieutenant Uhura Simon Pegg - Montgomery \Scotty\ Scott John Cho - Sulu Anton Yelchin - Chekov Idris Elba - Krall Sofia Boutella - Jaylah Joe Taslim - Manas Lydia Wilson - Kalara Deep Roy - Keenser Shohreh Aghdashloo - Commodore Paris Greg Grunberg - Commander Finnegan.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Mystery ║ 1979 ║ PG
programme.desc: The first sci-fi adventure movie based on the cult TV series, starring William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy. An unknown and awesome force is heading towards Federation space, on a direct course for Earth. The USS Enterprise is ordered back into immediate service and, with Captain James T Kirk once again in command, sets out to confront the mysterious alien menace Robert Wise - Director William Shatner - Admiral James T Kirk Leonard Nimoy - Mr Spock DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy Stephen Collins - Commander Willard Decker Persis Khambatta - Ilia James Doohan - Scotty George Takei - Sulu Nichelle Nichols - Uhura Walter Koenig - Chekov Majel Barrett - Dr Christine Chapel Grace Lee Whitney - Janice Rand.

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure sequel starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and Ricardo Montalban. In the 23rd century, Admiral James T Kirk is a guest aboard the Enterprise, which is taking part in a training exercise. But the routine voyage becomes a serious mission when his old ship is lured into a deadly trap, placing Kirk and his companions at the mercy of a crazed adversary, the formidable Khan Nicholas Meyer - Director William Shatner - Admiral James T Kirk Leonard Nimoy - Spock DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy James Doohan - Scotty Walter Koenig - Chekov George Takei - Sulu Nichelle Nichols - Commander Uhura Bibi Besch - Dr Carol Marcus Merritt Butrick - David Paul Winfield - Captain Terrell Kirstie Alley - Saavik Ricardo Montalban - Khan Ike Eisenmann - Midshipman Peter Preston Judson Earney Scott - Joachim Weiss.

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring William Shatner and DeForest Kelley. Barely surviving the wrath of Khan, the battle-scarred starship Enterprise limps back to Earth, saved only by the sacrifice of the late Captain Spock. However, the Vulcan's spirit is still with the crew, and back on the artificial Eden of the new Genesis planet his corpse is missing. Against orders, Admiral Kirk decides to lead the search for Spock and bring him home Leonard Nimoy - Director William Shatner - Admiral James T Kirk DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy James Doohan - Scotty George Takei - Sulu Walter Koenig - Chekov Nichelle Nichols - Uhura Christopher Lloyd - Kruge Robin Curtis - Lieutenant Saavik Merritt Butrick - David Marcus James B Sikking - Captain Styles Mark Lenard - Ambassador Sarek Leonard Nimoy - Spock.

programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Comedy, Fantasy ║ 1986 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. In the 23rd century, Captain Kirk and his intrepid band of space travellers discover a probe in the vicinity of Earth that is trying to contact a humpback whale, a species that is extinct. In order to prevent the probe destroying the planet, Kirk and his crew visit 1986 San Francisco in order to locate two whales to take back to the future Leonard Nimoy - Director William Shatner - Captain James T Kirk Leonard Nimoy - Spock Catherine Hicks - Dr Gillian Taylor DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy James Doohan - Scotty George Takei - Sulu Walter Koenig - Chekov Nichelle Nichols - Commander Uhura Majel Barrett - Dr Christine Chapel Jane Wyatt - Amanda, Spock's mother Mark Lenard - Sarek Robin Curtis - Lieutenant Saavik Robert Ellenstein - Federal Council President John Schuck - Klingon ambassador.

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Fantasy, Thriller ║ 1989 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure based on the popular TV series, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. The captain and crew of the untested new starship Enterprise travel to the desolate world of Nimbus III after a Vulcan mystic kidnaps a group of Federation diplomats. programme.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Thriller ║ 1991 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. The original crew of the Enterprise is given one final mission, to oversee the integration of the Klingons, who claim they want peace, into the intergalactic Federation. Captain Jean-Luc Picard and the crew of the Enterprise take up the challenge to pursue the Federation's most fearsome enemy and stop them from changing the future Jonathan Frakes - Director Patrick Stewart - Captain Jean-Luc Picard Jonathan Frakes - Commander William T Riker Brent Spiner - Lt Commander Data LeVar Burton - Lt Commander Geordi La Forge Michael Dorn - Lt Commander Worf Gates McFadden - Dr Beverly Crusher Marina Sirtis - Counselor Deanna Troi Alice Krige - Borg Queen James Cromwell - Zefram Cochrane Alfre Woodard - Lily Sloane Dwight Schultz - Lt Barclay Robert Picardo - Holographic doctor Neal McDonough - Lieutenant Hawk.

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Thriller, Fantasy ║ 1998 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring Patrick Stewart and Jonathan Frakes. The planet Ba'ku holds magical properties that keep the population young and living in harmony. So when an alien race attempts to take over this paradise, it falls to Captain Jean-Luc Picard and the crew of the Enterprise to defend the planet and its people Jonathan Frakes - Director Patrick Stewart - Captain Jean-Luc Picard Jonathan Frakes - Commander William T Riker Brent Spiner - Lt Commander Data LeVar Burton - Lt Commander Geordi La Forge Michael Dorn - Lt Commander Worf Gates McFadden - Dr Beverly Crusher Marina Sirtis - Counselor Deanna Troi F Murray Abraham - Ru'afo Donna Murphy - Anij Anthony Zerbe - Dougherty Gregg Henry - Gallatin.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure - the tenth entry in the franchise - starring Patrick Stewart. The crew of the Enterprise are on the verge of splitting up, following the wedding of Riker and Troi, when they are sent to investigate a suspect Romulan treaty. On arrival, they discover that the new leader of Romulus is the spitting image of Captain Picard Stuart Baird - Director Patrick Stewart - Jean-Luc Picard Jonathan Frakes - Cmdr William T Riker Brent Spiner - Lt Cmdr Data / B-4 LeVar Burton - Lt Cmdr Geordi La Forge Michael Dorn - Lt Cmdr Worf Marina Sirtis - Counselor Deanna Troi Gates McFadden - Dr Beverly Crusher Tom Hardy - Shinzon Ron Perlman - Viceroy Shannon Cochran - Senator Tal'aura Dina Meyer - Commander Donatra Kate Mulgrew - Admiral Janeway Wil Wheaton - Wesley Crusher Majel Barrett - Computer Whoopi Goldberg - Guinan Bryan Singer - Starfleet officer.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Mystery ║ 1979 ║ PG
programme.desc: The first sci-fi adventure movie based on the cult TV series, starring William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy. An unknown and awesome force is heading towards Federation space, on a direct course for Earth. The USS Enterprise is ordered back into immediate service and, with Captain James T Kirk once again in command, sets out to confront the mysterious alien menace Robert Wise - Director William Shatner - Admiral James T Kirk Leonard Nimoy - Mr Spock DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy Stephen Collins - Commander Willard Decker Persis Khambatta - Ilia James Doohan - Scotty George Takei - Sulu Nichelle Nichols - Uhura Walter Koenig - Chekov Majel Barrett - Dr Christine Chapel Grace Lee Whitney - Janice Rand.

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure sequel starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and Ricardo Montalban. In the 23rd century, Admiral James T Kirk is a guest aboard the Enterprise, which is taking part in a training exercise. But the routine voyage becomes a serious mission when his old ship is lured into a deadly trap, placing Kirk and his companions at the mercy of a crazed adversary, the formidable Khan Nicholas Meyer - Director William Shatner - Admiral James T Kirk Leonard Nimoy - Spock DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy James Doohan - Scotty Walter Koenig - Chekov George Takei - Sulu Nichelle Nichols - Commander Uhura Bibi Besch - Dr Carol Marcus Merritt Butrick - David Paul Winfield - Captain Terrell Kirstie Alley - Saavik Ricardo Montalban - Khan Ike Eisenmann - Midshipman Peter Preston Judson Earney Scott - Joachim Weiss.

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring William Shatner and DeForest Kelley. Barely surviving the wrath of Khan, the battle-scarred starship Enterprise limps back to Earth, saved only by the sacrifice of the late Captain Spock. However, the Vulcan's spirit is still with the crew, and back on the artificial Eden of the new Genesis planet his corpse is missing. Against orders, Admiral Kirk decides to lead the search for Spock and bring him home Leonard Nimoy - Director William Shatner - Admiral James T Kirk DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy James Doohan - Scotty George Takei - Sulu Walter Koenig - Chekov Nichelle Nichols - Uhura Christopher Lloyd - Kruge Robin Curtis - Lieutenant Saavik Merritt Butrick - David Marcus James B Sikking - Captain Styles Mark Lenard - Ambassador Sarek Leonard Nimoy - Spock.

programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Comedy, Fantasy ║ 1986 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. In the 23rd century, Captain Kirk and his intrepid band of space travellers discover a probe in the vicinity of Earth that is trying to contact a humpback whale, a species that is extinct. In order to prevent the probe destroying the planet, Kirk and his crew visit 1986 San Francisco in order to locate two whales to take back to the future Leonard Nimoy - Director William Shatner - Captain James T Kirk Leonard Nimoy - Spock Catherine Hicks - Dr Gillian Taylor DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy James Doohan - Scotty George Takei - Sulu Walter Koenig - Chekov Nichelle Nichols - Commander Uhura Majel Barrett - Dr Christine Chapel Jane Wyatt - Amanda, Spock's mother Mark Lenard - Sarek Robin Curtis - Lieutenant Saavik Robert Ellenstein - Federal Council President John Schuck - Klingon ambassador.

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Fantasy, Thriller ║ 1989 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure based on the popular TV series, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. The captain and crew of the untested new starship Enterprise travel to the desolate world of Nimbus III after a Vulcan mystic kidnaps a group of Federation diplomats. programme.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Thriller ║ 1991 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. The original crew of the Enterprise is given one final mission, to oversee the integration of the Klingons, who claim they want peace, into the intergalactic Federation. Initial hostility between the old adversaries is worsened by attacks against the Klingons from an unknown enemy within the Enterprise, and Kirk finds himself on the Klingons' home world, standing trial for murder Nicholas Meyer - Director William Shatner - Captain James T Kirk Leonard Nimoy - Spock DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy James Doohan - Montgomery \Scotty\ Scott Walter Koenig - Pavel Chekov Nichelle Nichols - Lieutenant Uhura George Takei - Captain Hikaru Sulu Kim Cattrall - Lieutenant Valeris Mark Lenard - Sarek Christopher Plummer - General Chang Iman - Martia Grace Lee Whitney - \Excelsior\ communications officer Brock Peters - Admiral Cartwright Leon Russom - Chief in Command Kurtwood Smith - Federation President David Warner - Chancellor Gorkon Rosana De Soto - Azetbur Christian Slater - \Excelsior\ crewman John Schuck - Klingon ambassador Michael Dorn - Klingon defense attorney Morgan Sheppard - Klingon commander.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2
programme.desc: Hollywood's favourite metalheads make a riotous return to stage a rock concert. While Wayne's booking Aerosmith, Garth's scoring with Kim Basinger. Head-banging comedy. (1993)(91mins).

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Rivals Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn seek the ultimate ageing cure and fight over wimpy Bruce Willis. Black comedy from Robert Zemeckis. Stereo sound only. (1992)(99 mins).

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: When a stray St Bernard becomes the newest member of the Newton family, his owners have to ward off a pair of dastardly dog-nappers. Flashing images/stereo sound only. (1992)(87 mins).

programme.title: School Of Rock
programme.desc: Jack Black is brilliant as the slacker guitarist who poses as a supply teacher and turns his class into a rock band. Cracking comedy from Richard Linklater. (2004)(109 mins).

programme.title: Mamma Mia
programme.desc: Meryl Streep belts out the ABBA tunes in this adaptation of the musical, which sees a bride-to-be try to learn the identity of her dad. Strong language. (2008)(108 mins).

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: The record-breaking jukebox musical returns for the grand opening of Hotel Bella Donna. With Meryl Streep, Lily James and Amanda Seyfried. (2018)(120 mins).

programme.title: Back To The Future Part III
programme.desc: Michael J Fox's Marty McFly heads back through the ages to the Old West in order to rescue Doc Brown (Christopher Lloyd). (1990).

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince Of Thieves
programme.desc: Kevin Costner is the hero leading a peasant revolt against the evil Sheriff of Nottingham (Alan Rickman). Stirring adventure with Morgan Freeman. Strong language/violence. (1991)(138 mins).

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze stars as a murdered banker whose ghost walks the Earth to protect girlfriend Demi Moore. Romance with Whoopi Goldberg. Contains strong language/sex/violence. (1990)(129 mins).

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Down-and-out stuntman Ryan Gosling sets out to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriend's blockbuster. Action with Emily Blunt. (2024)(126 mins).

programme.desc: Patrick Stewart returns to captain the Enterprise as his crew travel back in time to battle the Borg. Top sci-fi adventure. Contains flashing images. (1996)(106 mins).

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.desc: The crew of the Enterprise oppose the Federation's plans to depopulate a planet which seems to grant its inhabitants eternal life. Violence/flashing images. (1998)(98 mins).

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
programme.desc: Galactic peace is at stake when an evil clone leads the Romulans against the Enterprise. Featuring Patrick Stewart and Tom Hardy. Violence/flashing images. (2002)(112 mins).

programme.title: Deewana Mastana
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when a small time crook and a mental patient tries to win heart of a beautiful woman with comical outcomes.

programme.title: Unchai
programme.desc: Three retired friends go on a trek to the Everest Base Camp to fulfill their dying friend's last wish. What starts as an adventure soon turns into a personal journey of emotional enlightenment.

programme.title: Bhaiaji Superhit
programme.desc: A don with dreams of acting dives into Bollywood chaos. Between action, comedy, and romance, his wild journey to stardom turns the film industry upside down in the quirkiest way.

programme.title: Teri Bhabhi Hai Pagle
programme.desc: Dev, an assistant director, dreams of independently directing a film and manages to convince Raj, a superstar, to produce his film. However, chaos ensues as the shooting commences.

programme.title: Saand Ki Aankh
programme.desc: Chandro and Prakashi, who are in their 60s, accidentally discover their shooting skills. With the help of an instructor, they compete in competitions.

programme.title: Baaghi: Rebels In Love
programme.desc: (Movies @6) Dhanushkodi has pledged to kill Santosh. So his father sends him away and hires Murthy to masquerade as Santosh. Murthy is in love with Santosh's cousin and hence willing to risk his life.

programme.title: Bareilly Ki Barfi
programme.desc: In Bareilly, free-spirited Bitti defies marriage pressures until her life changes when she meets Chirag and Pritam, sparking unexpected adventures and romance.

programme.title: Chhatriwali
programme.desc: Movie revolves around Sanya, a chemistry genius who decides to use her skills to educate the youth on safe sex and bring about a much-needed social change while looking for a job.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Check out a fun roundup of the hottest Bollywood tracks that everyone is buzzing about! Discover the tunes that are making waves in the music scene.

programme.title: Roop Ki Rani Choron Ka Raja
programme.desc: Two orphaned children grow up to take revenge on their parents' killer, who is now a reformed and respectable citizen.

programme.title: Main Prem Ki Diwani Hoon
programme.desc: A girl breaks free from the confines of an arranged marriage, choosing to embrace life on her own terms and live passionately, discovering her true self along the way.

programme.title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster 3
programme.desc: A tale of betrayal, power, and passion unfolds as old enemies clash and new alliances form in a royal household riddled with secrets, ambition, and dangerously entangled love affairs.

programme.title: Loveyatri - A Journey Of Love
programme.desc: Sushrut who runs a garba academy falls in love with a beautiful Nri, Michelle, but her father creates a rift between the two. However, Sushrut is determined to win her back.

programme.title: Janhit Mein Jaari
programme.desc: A small-town girl from MP, Manokamna is on a mission. She must ace her new job as a salesperson for condoms. Will she be able to voice her beliefs while balancing her responsibilities and society?

programme.title: Bawaal
programme.desc: (Movies @6) In a small town, a regular guy falls head over heels for the stunning local beauty, hoping that winning her heart will give him a major status upgrade.

programme.title: Ghayal
programme.desc: Ajay, wrongfully framed by Balwant Rai, teams up with fellow convicts for a thrilling quest for revenge. Together, they plot to reclaim his life and settle the score.

programme.title: Kuch Kuch Locha Hai
programme.desc: A middle-aged Gujarati businessman puts on a charade after a famous film actress asks to move in with him, in preparation for a movie role.

programme.title: Shakti -The Power
programme.desc: A woman fights to escape a violent feudal world after tragedy strikes. Her strength and resilience become the weapon she never knew she had in this raw, emotional tale of survival.

programme.title: Jaan
programme.desc: Kajal's in deep trouble with Vishamber on her tail. Little does she know, her bodyguard Karan is actually working for him, with a deadly mission to eliminate her!

programme.title: Batti Gul Meter Chalu
programme.desc: Childhood friends SK, Lalita, and Sundar face turmoil when Sundar's printing press gets a staggering electricity bill, altering their lives dramatically.

programme.title: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
programme.desc: Vasudha falls for Aarav but the return of her missing husband Hari complicates their love.

programme.title: Silence
programme.desc: A mute detective investigates a chilling murder where silence hides deeper truths. As he deciphers cryptic clues, a haunting mystery unfolds with unexpected twists and emotional depth.

programme.title: Vicky Donor
programme.desc: (Movies @6) In 'Vicky Donor,' a struggling fertility expert seeks a perfect sperm donor and finds Vicky, a charming Punjabi lad, leading to unexpected love and hilarious challenges.

programme.title: Velle
programme.desc: When three criminals collide with a runaway girl, her friends, and an aspiring director, chaos ensues. Will this wild encounter lead to unexpected growth or trouble?

programme.title: Jism
programme.desc: Alcoholic lawyer Kabir falls for Sonia and persuaded to murder.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Check out a fun roundup of the hottest Bollywood tracks that everyone is buzzing about! Discover the tunes that are making waves in the music scene.

programme.title: Atkan Chatkan
programme.desc: A gifted boy with a love for music rises above poverty with the help of friends. Their passion forms an unforgettable melody in a tale of hope, dreams, and determination.

programme.title: Pardes
programme.desc: Kishorilal settled in USA comes down to India proposes that his son Rajeev marry Kusum, his friend's daughter.

programme.title: Judgementall Hai Kya
programme.desc: (2019) A landlord suspects new tenants in murder mystery amid normality. Starring Kangana Ranaut and Rajkummar Rao. Directed by Prakash Kovelamudi.

programme.title: Toofaan
programme.desc: An underdog boxer battles inner demons and social barriers to rise again after a fall. Fueled by love and resilience, he fights both in and out of the ring to reclaim his destiny.

programme.title: Hacked
programme.desc: Vivek, a troublesome hacker, wreaks havoc on girls' devices, costing Sameera her job. In a twist, Sameera murders him, but his hacking unexpectedly helps her escape justice.

programme.title: Henna
programme.desc: (Movies @6) Engagement day accident leads to Kashmir and love, spy suspicion.

programme.title: Article 15
programme.desc: Senior police officer Ayaan Ranjan has to come to grips with the reality of caste discrimination in the rural heartlands of India when a gruesome and unjust rape and murder case lands on his desk.

programme.title: Jism 2
programme.desc: Izna, an ex lover hired to trap an assassin attracts the officer's love. Sunny Leone won the 'Most Sensuous Debut' award at the Lions Gold Awards 2013.

programme.title: Shaheed
programme.desc: During the last days of the British Raj, the relationship between a civil servant father and his son is threatened by differing political allegiances.

programme.title: Chori Chori Chupke Chupke
programme.desc: A woman hired as a surrogate mother by a childless couple falls in love with the father of the child.

programme.title: Woh Bhi Din The
programme.desc: In Jamshedpur, Rahul finds himself tangled in a love triangle, making his friendships and choices way more complicated than he ever expected. Drama, romance, and tough decisions await!

programme.title: Sanam Teri Kasam
programme.desc: When an awkward librarian gets disowned by her family, she unexpectedly finds support from her mysterious, brooding neighbor, sparking an unlikely friendship-and maybe more.

programme.title: Main Khiladi Tu Anari
programme.desc: A cop goes on a revenge mission after his brother's murder by the underworld, but things get wild when a famous movie star decides to join in on the action!

programme.title: Jai Santoshi Maa
programme.desc: (Movies @6) Satyavati, a devout follower of Devi Maa Santoshi, faces marital challenges with Birajram, mistreated by his family. Believing in his survival, she endures trials and fasts.

programme.title: The Kashmir Files
programme.desc: In 1990, young college student Krishna embarks on a poignant journey to uncover the heartbreaking realities faced by the Kashmiri Pandit community, grappling with pain and loss.

programme.title: Gangster
programme.desc: Simran, who relocates to Seoul, is distraught when Daya, a gangster, re-enters her life. She has to make a choice between him and her lover Akash, who is a singer at an Indian restaurant.

programme.title: Shor
programme.desc: A devoted father lives solely to hear his son speak, but when his dream comes true, he unexpectedly loses his hearing, creating a bittersweet twist in their bond.

programme.title: Saudagar
programme.desc: When two former pals find their rivalry reignited by their grandchildren's unexpected romance, old grudges resurface, sparking hilarity and chaos as they navigate family ties and friendship.

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: When a flight turns into a trap, one man battles conspiracies and mechanical sabotage. His fight for truth takes off mid-air in this edge-of-the-seat survival thriller with sharp turns.

programme.title: Bob Biswas
programme.desc: An amnesiac assassin tries to restart life, but old sins return. As he uncovers layers of deception and rediscovery, morality blurs in this suspenseful spin-off from a chilling universe.

programme.title: Sharmaji Namkeen
programme.desc: Join a charming 60-year-old as he navigates the ups and downs of life, discovering joy, friendship, and a little wisdom along the way in this delightful coming-of-age tale.
